Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Placeable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Anchorable, Bounded, DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BufferedMoveable, Moveable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
    public interface Placeable
extends Bounded, Anchorable
    A Placeable has a methods that can be used to place it at a different x,y-coordinates on the YaegerScene.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default double getOriginX()  
      default double getOriginY()  
      void placeOnScene()
      Place the YaegerEntity on the scene at its x,y-coordinate.
      void setOriginX​(double x)
      Set the new x-coordinate of this YaegerEntity.
      void setOriginY​(double y)
      Set the new y-coordinate of this YaegerEntity.The y-coordinate will be of the top-left corner of the BoundingBox that is being used by this YaegerEntity.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.Anchorable

        getAnchorPoint, setAnchorPoint

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.Bounded

        getBottomY, getCenterX, getCenterY, getHeight, getLeftX, getNonTransformedBounds, getRightX, getTopY, getTransformedBounds, getWidth

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

        getGameNode, toBack, toFront

    • Method Detail

      • getOriginX

        default double getOriginX()
        Returns:
        The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the Bounding Box without any transformations (e.g. translations, rotations) as a double.

      • getOriginY

        default double getOriginY()
        Returns:
        The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the Bounding Box without any transformations (e.g. translations, rotations) as a double.

      • setOriginX

        void setOriginX​(double x)
        Set the new x-coordinate of this YaegerEntity. The x-coordinate will be of the top-left corner of the BoundingBox that is being used by this YaegerEntity.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate as a double.

      • setOriginY

        void setOriginY​(double y)
        Set the new y-coordinate of this YaegerEntity.The y-coordinate will be of the top-left corner of the BoundingBox that is being used by this YaegerEntity.
        Parameters:
        y - the y-coordinate as a double.

      • placeOnScene

        void placeOnScene()
        Place the YaegerEntity on the scene at its x,y-coordinate.
